titleHead: [CY] Have contacted DWP - Appeal a benefit decision - GOV.UK
title: [CY] Have you contacted DWP and asked them to reconsider their decision?
ucTitle: [CY] Did you ask DWP to reconsider their Universal Credit decision?
subtitle: [CY] You can still appeal if you have contacted DWP about their benefit decision but you don’t have the MRN letter, for example, because you lost it.

haveContactedDWP.yes: [CY] Yes, I’ve contacted DWP about the decision
haveContactedDWP.no: [CY] No, I haven’t contacted DWP about the decision

error.required: [CY] You need to say whether you contacted DWP about their decision. Selecet either yes or no.

haveContactedUCDWP.yes: [CY] Yes, I asked them to reconsider their decision
haveContactedUCDWP.no: [CY] No, I have not asked them to reconsider their decision
